oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Official website of the Alberta Public Affairs Bureau (PAB). The Public Affairs Bureau (PAB) provides communications support to government ministries and helps inform Albertans about government programs and policies. Includes news and updates on Government activities and initiatives as well as links to the Bureau's programs and services.
